name: Life as Landon
description:
Life as Landon
Fact Sheet
  • Developers: Bogdan- Valentin Fuiorea
  • Release Date: 30/04/2022
  • Platforms: Browser play
Description

It's time.. after all these years, Landon finds himself, once again, stuck in his own mind.  Each time, new memories. Is he finally ready to accept himself? Will he be able to understand life, and its beauty? Perhaps, you are Landon, aren't you?

Features
  • Explore a beautifully developed level, with Pixel art
  • Live Landon's memories, perhaps, you'll find yourself in some of them
  • Restore things back to normal and find closure
